description:
The Kiznaivers get stuck in a building during a typhoon and some hidden feelings start to come to light.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Happy Times Don`t Tend to Last Very Long
Happy na Jikantte Sousou Nagaku wa Tsuzukanai Mono Da yo ne
Mais généralement, les moments de bonheur ne durent pas
ハッピーな時間ってそうそう長くは続かないものだよね
